title: Handle Renewal with Price Increase
description: A customer is up for renewal, but the price for their plan has increased since last year. The Account Manager needs to communicate this and secure the renewal.

tasks.description: Prepare for the call by documenting the new features and value added to the product over the past year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent builds a justification for the price increase.

tasks.description: Contact the customer, communicate the new price, and explain the value that justifies it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proactively addresses the price change and reinforces the product's value.

tasks.description: If the customer objects, offer a small, one-time discount to ease the transition to the new price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses a discretionary discount to overcome the objection and secure the renewal.
